entry.title: Switch Theme Engine
entry.summary: OsmiCSX has added dark theme support in v0.6 release, but we forget to add the switcher method. So, today we release a new patch for OsmiCSX. Let's take a look

entry.title: Official Release v0.6
entry.summary: It has been 8 months since last update v0.5.1. After preparing carefully, we finally develop a new version of OsmiCSX and complete on July 2021. So, what's new inside OsmiCSX v0.6 ?
